132.title: Captain Marvel
notes:
Chronological listing of stories and appearances of the first Captain Marvel, originated in 1940 by
  • C.C. Beck
  • Pete Costanza
  • Bill Parker
This is the Captain Marvel whose secret identity is Billy Batson

Stories listed here originate in various comic book titles, including
  • Captain Marvel Adventures
  • Marvel Family
  • Shazam!
  • Whiz Comics
